settings.title: They're here!
settings.text:
Introducing our stunning collection of brand new Oak Pergolas, designed to transform your outdoor space into a stylish, functional retreat.

Crafted from premium quality oak and available in a variety of different roof styles, each pergola offers timeless beauty and exceptional durability, making them a perfect addition to any garden or patio.

settings.title: 4 Pitch Apex
settings.text: A striking pergola with a 4-pitch apex design, offering height and architectural elegance. Perfect for creating a sheltered and stylish outdoor space with a grand appearance.

settings.title: Apex
settings.text: A sleek and compact pergola with an apex roof and no overhang, ideal for minimalist designs where simplicity meets functionality in your garden.

settings.title: Lean-To
settings.text: A practical, space-saving pergola that attaches to the side of your home or building, offering a versatile shaded area while seamlessly extending your outdoor living space.

settings.title: Our Collection: Pergolas for Every Space
settings.description: Our collection of oak pergolas features a range of designs and configurations to suit any outdoor area, large or small. Whether you need a structure to shade a patio, define a dining area, or simply add a focal point to your garden, our pergolas offer endless possibilities for customisation.

settings.title: Flat Top
settings.text: A contemporary pergola with a flat roof design, perfect for modern gardens. It provides a clean and minimalist look while offering an open, airy feel.

settings.title: Apex with Overhang
settings.text: A traditional apex design featuring a generous overhang, this pergola offers additional shelter, creating a stylish, shaded retreat for outdoor relaxation.

settings.title: Open Roof
settings.text: A beautiful, airy pergola with an open roof design that allows sunlight to filter through, ideal for creating a light and spacious outdoor environment while retaining structure and style.

settings.title: Why Choose Oak Pergolas?
settings.text:
Oak is renowned for its exceptional strength and natural beauty, making it the perfect material for Pergolas that need to withstand the elements while enhancing your outdoor space.

Our Oak Pergolas are not only durable but also resistant to rot and decay, ensuring they last for many years. As oak ages, it develops a rich, silvery patina, adding to its timeless appeal and making each Pergola unique.

Easy Installation and Low Maintenance

At Ruby, we‚Äôve made it easy to bring your dream pergola to life. Our Oak Pergolas are designed for straightforward installation, allowing you to enjoy your new outdoor structure as soon as possible. Additionally, oak requires minimal maintenance to stay looking beautiful ‚Äì a simple annual cleaning and treatment with UV protection will help preserve its natural beauty and longevity.

settings.title: Premium Quality Materials
settings.answer: We use only the finest oak, ensuring that each pergola is crafted to perfection with a natural, rustic charm

settings.title: Durability and Strength
settings.answer: Oak is incredibly robust, making it ideal for long-term outdoor use. It resists wear, weather, and time, ensuring your pergola remains beautiful year after year

settings.title: Natural Beauty
settings.answer: Oak has a distinct grain and warm tones that complement any garden design, from traditional to modern.

settings.title: Key Benefits of Our Oak Pergolas:
